name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-js-powerbi-embedded
title: Embed a PowerBI report in a Client-Side Web Part
shortDescription: This sample SharePoint Framework client-side web part embedding a PowerBI report using PowerBI Embedded without any server-side code.
longDescription: This sample SharePoint Framework client-side web part embedding a PowerBI report using PowerBI Embedded without any server-side code.

thumbnails.alt: Embed a PowerBI report in a Client-Side Web Part

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
